# **PR Update Template**

Use this exact Markdown template in the body of your pull request comment, using "N/A" for sections that are not applicable.

```markdown
I addressed the following comments in this PR:

<!--
List out the comments that are addressed.
-->

## Self-testing Checklist

- [ ] Self-code review

<!--
Depend on the changed services/components/areas. Define self-testing checklist that Human should take to make sure the features work as expected before sending the PR for peer-review. The self-testing checklists must be blank.
-->

## Additional Notes (Optional)

<!--
Anything else reviewers should know?
e.g., new dependencies, environment variables, package, potential risks.
-->
```
